post:
Hello all,

We are glad to announce that we implement DNS service for VPS customers. 
Service is **FREE** till to 100 domains for new and existing customers.
You can add your domains and setup all type the DNS records. Of course you can modify, delete, add new records anytime. 
Management panel is very easy for usage.
We hope that this features would be popular for customers. 
More information can be found at https://www.robovps.biz/en/news/170-free-dns-servers-for-vps.html

Feel free touch us if you will need any assistance with using new service.
